snippet: Unlimited data plans usually come with an asterisk - the speed at which you get the data slows to a crawl after you have used a certain amount of data. T-Mobile is reversing the trend, adding an unlimited plan without restraints, but there is a...
abstract: Unlimited data plans usually come with an asterisk - the speed at which you get the data slows to a crawl after you have used a certain amount of data. T-Mobile is reversing the trend, adding an unlimited plan without restraints, but there is a catch.

headline.main: T-Mobile Offers a New Unlimited Data Plan
